evidence.claim: Concierge Care utilizes AWS Lambda for their serverless computing needs.
The company adheres to HIPAA compliance standards in their data handling practices.
Concierge Care implements FHIR APIs to integrate with electronic health records.
They use AWS S3 for data storage solutions within their cloud infrastructure.
Concierge Care supports X12 EDI transaction sets for health insurance claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: No substantial evidence of X12 or EDI use cases found on their website.
